episodes.name: Chapter 1
episodes.overview: When the newly elected President reneges on a promise, Francis and Claire decide to sever all allegiances and toss the rules out the window.

episodes.name: Chapter 2
episodes.overview: Francis and Doug plan to frame Secretary of State nominee, Michael Kern. Meanwhile, Zoe's popularity at the Washington Herald continues to grow.

episodes.name: Chapter 3
episodes.overview: Francis heads for his hometown to deal with a crisis. Zoe negotiates the politics of being a journalist on the rise. Claire finds herself a new business partner.

episodes.name: Chapter 4
episodes.overview: Francis shakes down the Congressional leadership. Zoe is offered the promotion of White House Correspondent and doesn't know if she should take it or not.

episodes.name: Chapter 5
episodes.overview: A feud starts between Francis and Marty Spinella. Russo goes into depression about the job losses at the shipyards.

episodes.name: Chapter 6
episodes.overview: The strike between Frank and Marty starts to get out of hand. Russo has decided to run for Governor of Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Chapter 7
episodes.overview: Frank helps Peter get ready for his governor race, but Peter is starting to have second thoughts. Doug tries to help a young hooker in trouble.

episodes.name: Chapter 8
episodes.overview: Frank has a library named after him at his old military school. Peter tries to win back the support of his hometown.

episodes.name: Chapter 9
episodes.overview: Frank tries to do whatever it takes to get the new bill passed in Congress. Russo goes on a bus campaign with the Vice President, but the VP is not making it an easy trip for him. Zoe's relationship with Frank gets a little bumpy.

episodes.name: Chapter 10
episodes.overview: Claire fuels an old flame. Peter wrestles with his demons. Francis crosses the point of no return.

episodes.name: Chapter 11
episodes.overview: Zoe extends her time away from The Hill while Francis tracks down Russo and engages in damage control.

episodes.name: Chapter 12
episodes.overview: The President sends Frank to St. Louis to persuade Raymond Tusk into becoming the new Vice President. Zoe and Janine investigate Peter Russo's death.

episodes.name: Chapter 13
episodes.overview: Frank scrambles to keep his plan on track. Gillian is planning to sue Claire. Zoe, Janine, and Lucas investigate Rachel Posner and her relationship with Peter Russo.

name: Season 1
overview: Betrayed by the White House, Congressman Francis Underwood embarks on a ruthless rise to power. Blackmail, seduction and ambition are his weapons.
